page.title: 20Local Firms and Businesses.
page.content: Although the area is mainly rural and the two villages of Needingworth and Holywell almost dormitory,the light industry on the outskirts of St Ives is quite varied.It is situated mainly on industrial sites set aside by local planners.One is a prime site and the other an ex_railway track.All,with the exception of a large gravel extract_ ion/cement products works, might be classed as medium to small firms. {Other Businesses Include: Food Products(2) Plastics(1) Windscreens(1) Flooring(1) Fibre Crafts (1) Wood P'ducts(1) Road Transport(1) Build P'ducts(1) Mini_Skip Hire (1) Welding(1) Agri/Machinery (1) Iron Products(1) Car/Caravan Sales(1) Gen.Eng.(1) Furnishing Warehse(2)Sheet Metal(1) Waste Paper(1) Hydraulic Hose(1) Printers (1) Precision Inst(1)
